item.title: By: Where Dreams are Built | Grand Mighty
item.dc:creator: Where Dreams are Built | Grand Mighty
item.description: [...] the generic, overhauled Craftsman ratchet (left) has been my bread-and-butter tool for a few years, it will now serve as my [...]

item.title: By: happy
item.dc:creator: happy
item.description: Thanks! Just did my 1/2" and 3/8" thanks to you. They work perfectly again. I found that a piece of plastic straw cut lengthwise is a pretty good aid for keeping the ball bearing from moving while the mesh gear is slid back into the housing.
item.content:encoded: Thanks! Just did my 1/2″ and 3/8″ thanks to you. They work perfectly again. I found that a piece of plastic straw cut lengthwise is a pretty good aid for keeping the ball bearing from moving while the mesh gear is slid back into the housing.

item.title: By: Eric

item.description:
Do it!
